channel.title: How can i add npc's in my server?
channel.description: also how to edit .cfg files? please answer

item.title: How can i add npc's in my server?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

go to autospawn.cfg in ur source,
than u will see all auto spawns,

Most of them are npcs
just copy 1 line and past it on the end and cchance the coords,
if u want u can chance the npc id to but i dont knowall the ids

Â© Little tut made by god of ikiliki

grtz

god[br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2006, 02:41:32 PM[/size][hr]To the new moparscape people,
This was one of my first help posts and located on the first post page of me,

Some people thought I knew everything already,
but nope here for example

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:1, topic:6440”]yoo its me

WHats the code for ancientss magicks emotes???
now if i use burst on a npc i just walk to it and hit 0 :s
so i need the really ccode for the emote

btw i use [glow=red,2,300]testscape![/glow]

and i need the item id of a Blood Rune

thx
God of ikiliki :D[/quote]

Read full topic
